description: This file is a Python script for generating C++ header and source files for JSON-RPC APIs based on a schema. It includes functions for creating API headers, generating classes, enums, version info, stubs, and RPC implementations, with checks for file freshness and conditions to prevent redundant work.

methods.name: CreateApiHeader(log, source_name, path, headers)
methods.description: Generates a C++ header file defining the JSON-RPC API, including necessary headers and formatting.

methods.name: Create(log, schema, source_file, path, additional_includes, generate_classes, generate_stubs, generate_rpc)
methods.description: Main function to generate JSON-RPC related code (classes, enums, version, stubs, RPC implementation) based on provided schema, flags, and context.

ctags.name: Create
ctags.pattern: /^def Create(log, schema, source_file, path, additional_includes, generate_classes, generate_stubs/
ctags.signature: (log, schema, source_file, path, additional_includes, generate_classes, generate_stubs, generate_rpc)
